column2: where state_change_b is not supported on ChromeOS:

column1: # `changes` should resolve into the above actions state_change_a and
# state_change_b. Since state_change_b does not support Mode2
# changes(Mode2) should only result in state_change_a(Mode2).
# `checks` should always resolve into check_a(Mode1) and check_b(Mode1).
